meanings.sent1: Her outfit had so much pazazzes, it caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was full of pazazzes, lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party lacked pazazzes until the clown arrived with his colorful balloons.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with the pazazzes of bustling activity.
meanings.sent5: The singer's performance was unforgettable, filled with pazazzes that left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: To add flair or excitement to something
meanings.sent1: She pazazzes up her cupcakes with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer pazazzes the room with vibrant artwork.
meanings.sent3: The magician pazazzes his tricks with a touch of humor to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: The chef pazazzes the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent5: The dance routine was pazazzed up with energetic moves and bright costumes.
